content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: CreateZone path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/dns/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/zones content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum create a zone
reqbody
zonecreatezonemessage
type obj
props
domain
type str
desc the zones domain name
labels
type str
desc a key/value pair of userdefined labels for a dns zone

zone labels are not processed by stackpath and are solely used for users to organize their dns zones
useapexdomain
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not to create a zone for the apex domain only

if this is true and a domain with subdomains is provided it will be stripped and only the root domain will be used for the zone if this is false an error will be returned if its not already an apex domain
required true
responses
200
zonecreatezoneresponse
type obj
zonezone
type obj
props
stackid
type str
desc the id of the stack that a zone belongs to
accountid
type str
desc the id of the stackpath account that owns a zone
id
type str
desc a zones unique id
domain
type str
desc a zones name
version
type str
desc a zones version number

version numbers are incremented automatically when a zone is updated
labels
type str
desc a key/value pair of userdefined labels for a zone

zone labels are not processed by stackpath and are solely used for users to organize their dns zones
created
type str
format datetime
desc the date a zone was created
updated
type str
format datetime
desc the date a zone was last updated
nameservers
type str
desc the hostnames of the stackpath resolvers that host a zone

every zone has multiple name servers assigned by stackpath upon creation for redundancy purposes
verified
type str
format datetime
desc the date a zones nameservers were last audited by stackpath
zonezonestatus
type str
default active
disabled
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a zone has been disabled by the user
desc a dns zone

a zone represents an individual domain in stackpaths dns infrastructure
desc a response from a request to create a new dns zone
title: 37_Zones_CreateZone_208.json
